channel.title: CVE Feed for cyberhobo -- Geo Mashup
channel.description: The latest CVEs for cyberhobo -- Geo Mashup

item.title: CVE-2024-8990|2024-10-01T15:43:09.706Z -- cyberhobo -- geo%20mashup
item.description: The Geo Mashup plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's geo_mashup_visible_posts_list shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 1.13.13 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
